name: Fury Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have double strike.
flavor_text:

—Adom Capashen, Benalish hero

name: Kor Outfitter

name: Siren Lookout
oracle_text:
Flying

name: Wormfang Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
When Wormfang Drake enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake.
When Wormfang Drake leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
printed_text:
Voar
Quando Dragonete Dentígero entra em jogo, sacrifique-o a menos que você remova de jogo outra criatura que você controla que não seja Dragonete Dentígero.
Quando Dragonete Dentígero sai de jogo, devolva o card removido para o jogo sob o controle de seu dono.

name: Chandra, Pyrogenius
printed_name: 紅蓮の俊英、チャンドラ
printed_type_line: プレインズウォーカー — チャンドラ
oracle_text:
+2: Chandra, Pyrogenius deals 2 damage to each opponent.
−3: Chandra, Pyrogenius deals 4 damage to target creature.
−10: Chandra, Pyrogenius deals 6 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
printed_text:
+2：紅蓮の俊英、チャンドラは各対戦相手にそれぞれ２点のダメージを与える。
-3：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。紅蓮の俊英、チャンドラはそれに４点のダメージを与える。
-10：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。紅蓮の俊英、チャンドラはそのプレイヤーとそのプレイヤーがコントロールする各クリーチャーにそれぞれ６点のダメージを与える。

name: Transluminant

name: Shardless Agent
oracle_text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
flavor_text: "La hoja izquierda es para una muerte rápida e indolora. La derecha, para una lenta e interminable. Yo elijo".
